solution_line_template: The terrier barked twice as many times as it was told to hush, so it barked {hush_times} * {terrier_bark_multiplier} = <<{hush_times}*{terrier_bark_multiplier}={terrier_barks}>>{terrier_barks} times.
The poodle barked two times for every terrier bark, so it barked {terrier_barks} * {poodle_bark_ratio} = <<{terrier_barks}*{poodle_bark_ratio}={poodle_barks}>>{poodle_barks} times.
